text:
Hi all,

normaly, under HP-UX, shared object should have the extention .sl but Apache 
1.3.29 still use '.so' (it was corrected in Apache 2.0 tree).

Even if it doesn't produce troubles at run time (AFIK), it cause compilation 
problem for some external module like PHP. In every case, the workaround is 
obvious, but it should better if it use the standard extention like w/ 2.0.xx

Thanks and regards,

Laurent
creator: l_faillie@yahoo.com
